solution_line_template: There are {num_baskets} Easter egg baskets with {eggs_per_basket} Easter eggs in them, {num_baskets} x {eggs_per_basket} = <<{num_baskets}*{eggs_per_basket}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} Easter eggs.

There are {other_adults} adults + Shonda ({shonda}) + {shondas_kids} of Shonda's kids + {friends} of their friends = <<{other_adults}+{shonda}+{shondas_kids}+{friends}={total_people}>>{total_people} people at the Easter egg hunt.
There are {total_eggs} Easter eggs for {total_people} people, {total_eggs} / {total_people} = <<{total_eggs}/{total_people}={eggs_per_person}>>{eggs_per_person} Easter eggs each for everyone.
